org.microtitan.diffusive.translator

Interface DiffusiveTranslator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javassist.Translator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDiffusiveTranslator

    public interface DiffusiveTranslator
extends javassist.Translator
    Observer of the Loader, which calls the Translator.start(ClassPool) and Translator.onLoad(ClassPool, String) method of an INSTANCE of this object. These methods can be used to translate the byte code before it is loaded. The DiffusiveTranslator is intended to intercept method calls to methods that are annotated with @Diffusive.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp
